means: 粗俗幽默的，法国讽刺作家拉伯雷的

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or characteristic of Francois Rabelais or his works;

auth_sentence.content: Her resonant voice covers the gamut from an emphatic whisper to an...almost Rabelaisian roar.
